Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:Not active up to 100 µM

Literature.Title: A Computationally Designed Peptide Derived from Escherichia coli as a Potential Drug Template for Antibacterial and Antibiofilm Therapies
Literature.Author: Cardoso MH, Cândido ES, Chan LY, Der Torossian Torres M, Oshiro KGN, Rezende SB, Porto WF, Lu TK, de la Fuente-Nunez C, Craik DJ, Franco OL.
